resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/31938</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>31938</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:3100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>3100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Soltau - introduktion</string>
            <string language="en">Soltau - introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Soltau - Einleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soltau - introduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soltau - introdução</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soltau - introduzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Soltau - εισαγωγή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soltau - introducción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">I den här modulen lär du dig bland annat:- Ord och fraser för att kunna tala om var du har ont någonstans om du måste uppsöka en läkare eller besöka ett apotek.- Prepositioner som styr både ackusativ och dativ.- Några vanliga tyska talesätt.Tyska steg 1.</string>
            <string language="en">In this module, you learn you among other thing:

- words and phrases in order to can to speak about where you have ont somewhere if you must uppsöka a doctor or visit a pharmacy.

- prepositions that govern both ackusativ and dativ.

- some common German</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Tyska 1</string>
            <string language="sv">tyska</string>
            <string language="sv">Soltau</string>
            <string language="en">German 1</string>
            <string language="en">German</string>
            <string language="en">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In diesem Modul erlernen Sie Sie unter anderer 
Sache:- Wörter und Phrasen zwecks einmachen, um ungefähr zu 
sprechen, wo Sie Ontario irgendwo haben, wenn Sie uppsöka ein Doktor 
müssen oder eine Apotheke zu besuchen - Präpositionen, die ackusativ
und dativ. regeln - etwas geläufiger Deutscher</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans ce module, vous vous apprenez entre l'autre 
chose : - mots et expressions afin de mettre en boîte de parler
environ où vous avez l'Ontario quelque part si vous devez uppsöka un
docteur ou de visiter une pharmacie - prépositions qui régissent 
l'ackusativ et le dativ. - un certain Allemand commun</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste módulo, você aprende-o entre a outra 
coisa:- palavras e frases a fim enlatar para falar 
aproximadamente onde você tem o Ontário em algum lugar se você 
dever uppsöka um doutor ou para visitar um pharmacy. - preposições 
que governe  o ackusativ e o dativ. - algum alemão comum</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questo modulo, li imparate tra altra cosa: - 
parole e frasi per inscatolare per parlare circa dove avete 
Ontario in qualche luogo se dovete uppsöka un medico o per visitare 
una farmacia - preposizioni che governa sia il ackusativ che dativ. - 
un certo tedesco comune</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την ενότητα, σας μαθαίνετε μεταξύ άλλου 
πράγματος: - λέξεις και φράσεις προκειμένου μπορεί να 
μιλήσει για όπου έχετε ont κάπου εάν πρέπει uppsφka ένας
γιατρός ή να επισκεφτείτε ένα φαρμακείο - προθέσεις που κυβερνά
και το ackusativ και dativ. - τα κάποια κοινά γερμανικά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este módulo, usted le aprende entre la otra 
cosa:- palabras y frases para conservar para hablar alrededor 
donde usted tiene Ontario en alguna parte si usted debe uppsöka un 
doctor o para visitar una farmacia - preposiciones que gobierna el 
ackusativ y dativ. - un cierto alemán común</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutscher 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Deutsch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Allemand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alemão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tedesco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alemán 1</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alemán</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soltau</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
